Feeling tired or fatigued? When was the last time you had a meaningful break?

Your wellbeing is important to us and we know how critical it is that you get time off from work to rest and recharge. Even though various COVID restrictions mean that we may not be able to travel far from home, don’t put it off!

You are receiving this message because you have accrued a high amount of annual leave. We want to work with you to get you the break you deserve!

What's the next step?

  • Have a conversation with your line manager to create a leave plan that works for you
  • Review the Leave policies on the People Portal to understand what options may be available for you
  • Once you have spoken to your manager and reviewed the relevant policies, ensure you are booking your leave through TeamSpace or SuccessFactors as soon as possible
  • Once you're comfortable with your leave plan and have booked your leave, mark this task as done by clicking on the button below
